news.description: Stay informed with the latest news and updates about the Lebanese parliamentary elections.

electoralLaws.altTextTimeline: A timeline showing the electoral process: starting with registration, followed by campaign period, election day, vote counting, and finally the announcement of results.
electoralLaws.altTextPR: A visual metaphor showing votes as marbles falling into buckets representing electoral lists. A threshold bar shows the minimum votes needed to qualify. Lists below this threshold are excluded from seat allocation.
electoralLaws.altTextVoting: Step-by-step guide showing the voting process: identity verification, receiving ballot, entering the booth, casting the vote, and signing with ink marking.
electoralLaws.altTextEngine: An animation showing how votes are converted to seats: bars represent list votes, and a grid shows seats being allocated proportionally based on the voting results.
electoralLaws.altTextRules: Cards showing electoral rules - tap each card to reveal whether the action is allowed or not allowed.
electoralLaws.altTextRights: A split view showing voter rights on one side and voter duties on the other side.
